outputs.name: Quest Option
outputs.value: Step into the caves

outputs.name: Link 1
outputs.value: navigation

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
As you enter, a cool breeze carries the scent of damp stone through the cavern's threshold. The rhythmic drip of water echoes, revealing a network of tunnels adorned with glistening minerals. Bioluminescent fungi softly illuminate the path, offering a choice between two tunnels, both leading into the heart of the labyrinthine system.

The distant murmur of an underground river adds to the mysterious ambiance.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: Go to Whispering Tunnels

outputs.name: Option 2
outputs.value: Go to Luminescent Lagoon

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
Venturing down the left tunnel brings you into the [b][color=blue]Whispering Tunnels[/color][/b], where the wind weaves through narrow passages, carrying with it distant whispers.

The walls bear the marks of previous explorers, guiding you deeper into the subterranean labyrinth.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: Go to Crystal Grotto

outputs.name: Link 1
outputs.value: caves-quest-2

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
Within the [b][color=blue]Whispering Tunnels[/color][/b], a concealed passage unveils the breath taking [b][color=blue]Crystal Grotto[/color][/b].

Towering crystalline formations illuminate the cavern with a soft, colourful glow, creating an awe-inspiring spectacle that hints at the treasures concealed within the earth.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: Go to Subterranean Waterfall

outputs.name: Option 2
outputs.value: Go to Glowworm Gallery

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
From the [b][color=blue]Crystal Grotto[/color][/b], a narrow passage leads to the [b][color=blue]Subterranean Waterfall[/color][/b].

The soothing sounds of rushing water accompany the mesmerizing sight of a hidden cascade, adding a touch of natural beauty to the subterranean landscape.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
A branching tunnel from the [b][color=blue]Subterranean Waterfall [/color][/b] guides you to the [b][color=blue]Glowworm Gallery[/color][/b].

The low-ceilinged passage is adorned with luminescent glowworms, casting a celestial glow and offering a serene contrast to the caves' darker recesses.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
You arrive to the the [b][color=blue]Luminescent Lagoon[/color][/b], an expansive underground pool fed by a subterranean stream.

The bioluminescent algae within the lagoon casts an ethereal glow, creating a captivating and serene ambiance.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: Go to Fungal Grove

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
A connecting tunnel from the [b][color=blue]Luminescent Lagoon[/color][/b] guides you to the [b][color=blue]Fungal Grove[/color][/b], a cavernous space filled with diverse fungi.

Some fungi emit a gentle light, illuminating the space and creating an otherworldly atmosphere.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: Go to Abandoned Miner's Camp

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
Continuing through the [b][color=blue]Fungal Grove[/color][/b] reveals an [b][color=blue]Abandoned Miner's Camp[/color][/b].

Rusting tools and tattered tents tell tales of past expeditions, providing insights into the challenges faced by those who once delved into the caves.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: Go to Echoing Hall of Crystals

outputs.name: Option 2
outputs.value: Read miner's journals

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
From the [b][color=blue]Abandoned Miner's Camp[/color][/b], a secret passage unveils the [b][color=blue]Echoing Hall of Crystals[/color][/b].

The grand hall is adorned with crystalline formations that amplify sound, creating a unique acoustic environment within the depths of the caves.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
[i]Date: 23rd of Deepfall, 1423 AE

"Today, I stumbled upon a peculiar cavern in the [b][color=blue]Whispering Tunnels[/color][/b], marked by a distinct set of symbols etched into the walls. As I pressed on, I noticed that the echoes here seemed to guide me, whispering hints of the correct path.

Among the symbols, a trio of interconnected circles caught my eye. According to local lore, this marks the entrance to an ancient chamber holding untold secrets. To reach it, one must heed the whispers and follow the echoes that resonate with the symbol.

I believe this discovery may lead to a hidden part of the caves, perhaps even to the legendary [b][color=blue]Radiant Crystal[/color][/b] we've heard of in [b]Oakhaven[/b]."

- Eldric Stoneforge[/i]
